description: This script is a utility for testing the availability of TCP hosts and ports, often used to wait for services to become available before proceeding with startup routines in a microservices or deployment environment.

methods.name: echoerr
methods.description: Outputs error messages to stderr unless in quiet mode.

methods.name: wait_for
methods.description: Waits for a specified TCP host and port to become available, with optional timeout.

methods.name: wait_for_wrapper
methods.description: Runs wait_for in a subshell with timeout and handles signals.
